pages.text: A variety of mobs appears inside The Vault. Some mobs don't appear before a certain player level. The health, damage, armor and weapons a mob has is $(l)scaled to player level$(). $(br2)

$(l)Elite Mobs$() are stronger versions of the base mob with a different look that have a different special ability when fought or killed. Killing Elite Mobs yield more Vault exp. $(br2)Another common Vault Mob is the $(l)Vault Dweller$(). Be aware that the Vault Dweller, in regards to other mobs, can jump! $(br2)$(l)Bosses$() appear when all obelisks are activated in the 'Kill the Boss' objective.
Boogieman is the most common boss. It has a high base health and regenerates health when left untouched.
A flying boss with ranged attacks and an ability to deflect range attacks. It can teleport up to the player.
A rare boss with a long range of attacks. It has a high attack speed and can do critical attacks.
A rare boss that moves around like a slime cube.
